name.description: The name of component we create a spec for

update.description: Whether or not to update a pre-existing spec file.

classTemplate.description: the path to a file to be used when creating a spec file for a class

functionTemplate.description: the path to a file to be used when creating a spec file for a function

config.description: config file path. If the default locations (package.json .scurirc .scurirc.json .scurirc.yml .scurirc.yaml scurirc.js scurirc.config.js) are not enough

framework.description: Only needed for Update. Can be set in Config too. Testing framework (jasmine or jest), default is jasmine
